name: Top Down Racer
description: Buckle up and hit the gas! Beat the time records and compare your high score with all players worldwide.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, or above Processor: 1.2 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse & Keyboard / Display Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720
